thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian and Her Kids Dress Up as Superheroes for Halloween
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian and Her Kids Dress Up as Superheroes for Halloween

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kourtney Kardashian and Her Kids Dress Up as Superheroes for Halloween
text:
Comments Kourtney and her three young children wear bright-colored superhero outfits while North West is adorable in a unicorn costume. 
Move over Taylor Swift ! There is a new squad in town. Kourtney Kardashian channeled her inner superhero along with her three young children. The reality TV star posted on Instagram their vibrant red-and-blue Halloween costumes. "Squad," so Kourtney proudly said in the caption. A photo posted by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Oct 24, 2015 at 6:03pm PDT Kourtney dressed up as Wonder Woman with her form-fitting gold-and-red jumpsuit while Mason, 5, Penelope, 3, and Reign, 10 months matched their mother with their own bright outfits completed with capes and lightning bolts on their chests. They were joined by Kim Kardashian 's little girl, North West, who opted for a Unicorn. ⚡️⭐️ A photo posted by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Oct 24, 2015 at 8:30pm PDT Noticeably missing from the adorable pictures was baby daddy, Scott Disick . He is seeking treatment at a rehabilitation center for addiction to alcohol and drugs in the wake of Lamar Odom 's medical crisis. Scott had gone to rehab before breaking up with Kourtney but he left early back then. 
© AceShowbiz.com
